creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: six parts; decorated with a bamboo blind in front of a plum tree in gold, black, red and silver lacquer on a black lacquer ground
marks: Signature and Seal on bottom: [Kajikawa saku]
medium: Lacquer, roiro, gold, silver, red hiramakie, takamakie, togidashi
title: [Inrō showing flowering cherry branches seen through a bamboo blind]
